Package com.g1.mychess.player.service

Interface ProfileService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfileServiceImpl
public interface ProfileService
Service interface for managing player profiles in the system. Provides methods for updating ratings, retrieving and updating profiles, and accessing the leaderboard.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<LeaderboardProfileDTO>
    getLeaderboard()
    Retrieves the leaderboard, which lists profiles based on player ratings.
    PlayerProfileDTO
    getPlayerProfile(Long playerId)
    Retrieves the profile of a player by their player ID.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>
    updatePlayerProfile(Long playerId, PlayerProfileUpdateDTO profileUpdateDTO)
    Updates the profile information of a player.
    void
    updateProfileRating(PlayerRatingUpdateDTO ratingUpdateDTO)
    Updates the player's rating based on the provided rating update data.

  • Method Details

    • updateProfileRating

      void updateProfileRating(PlayerRatingUpdateDTO ratingUpdateDTO)
      Updates the player's rating based on the provided rating update data.
      Parameters:
      ratingUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the rating update details.

    • getPlayerProfile

      PlayerProfileDTO getPlayerProfile(Long playerId)
      Retrieves the profile of a player by their player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose profile is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a PlayerProfileDTO containing the player's profile details.

    • updatePlayerProfile

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updatePlayerProfile(Long playerId, PlayerProfileUpdateDTO profileUpdateDTO)
      Updates the profile information of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose profile is to be updated.
      profileUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the updated profile details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response message after updating the profile.

    • getLeaderboard

      List<LeaderboardProfileDTO> getLeaderboard()
      Retrieves the leaderboard, which lists profiles based on player ratings.
      Returns:
      a list of LeaderboardProfileDTO objects representing the leaderboard.
